t: Amazon.com: Boise State University
Amazon announces sixth Idaho facility, a Boise sort center
s: January 19, 2021 - Amazon announced on Jan. 6 that it will open another large facility in Boise. The 250,000-square-foot facility will be Amazon’s first sort center in Idaho. The location will be at the Boise Gateway Industrial Park, south of the Boise Airport at the intersection of S. Eisenman Road and Freight ...

t: Amazon boom continues: Huge new warehouse in south Boise likely for retail giant
s: April 25, 2022 - It appears Amazon, Inc. plans another large facility in the Treasure Valley. Yes, another one. It’s the latest in a significant series of buildouts in the Boise area by the retailing giant. Dubbed Project Dove, the large facility would be part of the Pleasant Valley Business Park project ...

t: Amazon plans new Nampa, ID warehouse
s: April 17, 2024 - Amazon is continuing its expansion into the Treasure Valley. Permits indicate that Amazon applied to add a conveyor belt in a newly-built building in the Kings Road Commerce Center, at 2800 E Comstock Ave. in Nampa.
